oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allison, Madeline T., 1876 March 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Madeline T. Allison, dated February 4th, 1876. Illustrates the first page of the document. Allison’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on March 16th, 1876 “recorded Book 24, page 100.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allison family
